Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

validation.validation: Enter a Writeoff Amount sign that matches the amount due sign.
To submit this writeoff, specify a customer that matches the invoice customer.
You can't write off this invoice because it has pending activity
To submit this writeoff, specify a currency that's same as the invoice currency.
You must include at least 1 invoice with this writeoff.
You cannot create a writeoff without a currency.
For direct intercompany invoices, enter a Total Writeoff Amount that's equal to Amount Due.
Specify a Writeoff Amount that's not greater than the Amount Due.
To submit this writeoff, specify a company that matches the invoice company.
You can't writeoff an invoice where the tax line has VAT in pending status.
You're trying to submit a writeoff that has approved intercompany receipts. To write off the bad debt, first pay the direct intercompany customer invoice: [invoice].

Invoice_For_Writeoff_WWS_Data.description: The Total Amount of the Invoice or Adjustment attached to this Writeoff.
The Amount Due still remaining on the Invoice or Adjustment attached to the Writeoff.

validation.validation: The writeoff amount and the amount on the associated Balancing Worktag line must have the same positive or negative sign. To writeoff this invoice, make sure that the sign is same as the sign of the invoice or adjustment amount.
Specify a Writeoff Amount that's greater than zero.
The writeoffs can't exceed the balance on the associated Balancing Worktag. To see the remaining balance for the worktag, refer to the Line Distribution on this customer invoice.
Specify a Writeoff Amount that's not greater than the Amount Due.
